Player History
Earned first career win on 8/12/1970...
Injured on 8/19/1976 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Oakland in 1978...
Injured on 7/11/1978 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/24/1981 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/11/1982...
Injured on 6/23/1982 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/18/1983 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 7-8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/1/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Traded from Texas to Detroit on 1/31/1993 (Going to TEX: P R. Bailey. Going to DET: P M. Boddicker)...
Injured on 5/19/1993 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
